009package imagingbook.pdf;
010
011import java.io.IOException;
012
013import com.lowagie.text.DocumentException;
014import com.lowagie.text.pdf.BaseFont;
015
016import imagingbook.core.resource.NamedResource;
017
018/**
019 * This class collects the set of 14 Type-1 standard fonts that every
020 * PS/PDF reader is supposed to have available by default.
021 * The associated resource directory contains both .AFM and .PFB files.
022 * iText/OpenPDF never embeds any of these fonts on the exported PDF,
023 * which may cause problems during pre-press checking, where generally
024 * ALL fonts should be embedded.
025 * 
026 * @author WB
027 *
028 */
029public enum Type1CoreFont implements NamedResource {
030        
031        Courier("Courier.afm"),
032        CourierBold("Courier-Bold.afm"),
033        CourierBoldOblique("Courier-BoldOblique.afm"),
034        CourierOblique("Courier-Oblique.afm"),  
035        Helvetica("Helvetica.afm"),
036        HelveticaBold("Helvetica-Bold.afm"),
037        HelveticaBoldOblique("Helvetica-BoldOblique.afm"),
038        HelveticaOblique("Helvetica-Oblique.afm"),      
039        TimesRoman("Times-Roman.afm"),
040        TimesBold("Times-Bold.afm"),
041        TimesBoldItalic("Times-BoldItalic.afm"),
042        TimesItalic("Times-Italic.afm"),        
043        Symbol("Symbol.afm"),
044        ZapfDingbats("ZapfDingbats.afm")
045        ;
046        
047        private static final String BASEDIR = "fonts/type1/";
048        
049        private final String relPath;
050        private BaseFont basefont = null;               // cached BaseFont instance
051
052        /**
053         * Constructor.
054         * @param afmName the name of the associated AFM file
055         */
056        Type1CoreFont(String afmName) {
057                this.relPath = BASEDIR + afmName;
058        }
059        
060        @Override
061        public String getRelativePath() {
062                return relPath;
063        }
064        
065        
066        private String getFontPath() {
067                return getURL().toString();
068        }
069        
070        /** 
071         * Returns the {@link BaseFont} instance associated with this enum element.
072         * The font is created when this method is called the first time.
073         * 
074         * @return the {@link BaseFont} instance associated with this font
075         */
076        public BaseFont getBaseFont() {
077                if (basefont == null) {
078                        try {
079                                basefont = BaseFont.createFont(getFontPath(), "", BaseFont.EMBEDDED);
080                        } catch (DocumentException | IOException e) { 
081                                System.out.println("Trouble: " + e);
082                        }
083                }
084                return basefont;
085        }
086
087        // -----------------------------------------------
088        
089        public static void main(String[] args) {
090                System.out.println("Anchor is in JAR: " + Type1CoreFont.Courier.isInsideJar());
091                for (Type1CoreFont sf : Type1CoreFont.values()) {
092                        System.out.println(sf.toString() + ": " + sf.getBaseFont().getPostscriptFontName());
093                        System.out.println("   " + sf.getRelativePath());
094                        System.out.println("   " + sf.getStream());
095                        System.out.println("   " + sf.getFontPath());
096                        System.out.println("   " + sf.getBaseFont());
097                        
098                }
099        }
100
101
102}
103
